author: Staff Reporter
text:
The City police on Sunday arrested three men who tried to sell a country-made pistol.

Mohanraj, Sabarai Rajan, and Rajesh Kumar, all residents of the city, were attempting to sell the country-made pistol and ammunitions near Koyambedu. Based on a tip-off, a police team from the Organised Crime Investigation wing tracked them and picked them up near the Koyambedu market.

The police said that Mohanraj of Vyasarpadi was being interrogated as he is believed to have some link with notorious gangster C.D. Mani and could be involved in the recent attack on DMK functionary Jagan alias Jaganathan in Saidapet. A country-made pistol and three rounds of ammunition were seized from them, they said. On investigation, it was found that the three were acting on behalf of Aarif, a known offender in Nagapattinam. The police are searching for Aarif, sources said.
title: Police seize country-made pistol, arrest three men
